qas.question: When was the Republic of China founded?
Who was the first president of the Republic of China?
Who moved the capital from Nanjing to Beijing?

context: The Xinhai Revolution led to the founding of the Republic of China in <a0_0>January 1912<a0_0/> with <a1_0>Sun Yat-sen<a1_0/> as the first provisional president and Nanking was selected as its new capital. However, the Qing Empire controlled large regions to the north, so revolutionaries asked <a2_0>Yuan Shikai<a2_0/> to replace Sun as president in exchange for the abdication of Puyi, the Last Emperor. Yuan demanded the capital be Beijing (closer to his power base).
